scripts.all: lerna bootstrap && npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.ci: lerna bootstrap && npm run-script clean && npm run-script lint && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.update: for d in ./packages/*; do npm-check-updates -i --packageFile $d/package.json; done
scripts.heroku-cleanup: du -ha --max-depth 1 . | sort -hr && du -ha --max-depth 1 packages | sort -hr && npx lerna exec 'npm prune --production' && du -ha --max-depth 1 . | sort -hr && du -h  -t 20M . | sort -hr
